chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Wood of a certain length, such as 100 Chinese inches, can be used as a cane.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " zhang " sound. The original meaning is cane. "Shuowen": "Stand, hold it. Congmu, Zhangsheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Anything that can be held and held by others is called a stick." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Two Years of Ding Gong": "Duke Lu Zhuang and Yi Shegu drank alcohol and went out privately. Begging for meat, grab the rod to knock it." "Book of Rites. "The first song of the ceremony": "The doctor is seventy and gives an issue. If you can't thank you, you will give you a few sticks."

" Stand " generally refers to various sticks. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Guy Zuo": "The people of Zhongshan who have many powers call me Qiuyi, dressed in iron armor and wielding an iron rod to fight, and all the blows are broken, and the rushes are all falling." "Lun Heng. "Dead Puppet": "Jiangong will enter the Huanmen, Zhuang Ziyi rises from Daozuo, holding a red stick and beating him, he is killed under the car."

" Stand " means to hold and hold. Such as "Shang Shu. "Shepherd Oath": "Wang left sticks yellow yue, right Bingbai yelled at each other." Yinqueshan Han bamboo slips "Grandson. March "Jan 98: "He who stands on the rod is hungry."

The extension of " stick " means to rely on and rely on. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Eighth Year of Xianggong": "After keeping the old Chu, and sticking to the faith to wait for the Jin Dynasty, can it not be enough?" "Han Shu. "Du Zhou Chuan": "Your Majesty ascended to the throne at first, humility to the emperor, lonely and maverick, can not rely on the rod, and the ministers change the world, and the mind is like a soup."

" Zhang " is the name of ancient criminal law, that is, stick punishment. Such as "Sui Shu. "Criminal Law Chronicles": "Five refers to rods. There is a difference of thirty, twenty, ten, and the third class." It also refers to the execution of the rod and the beating with the rod. Such as "Sui Shu. "Criminal Law History": "After Chuzhou traveled to join the army, Li Juncai said that the emperor's favor was too high, and the emperor was furious, and his life rod."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " zhang " sound. The original meaning is cane.

Basic explanation of words
Rod
zh√†ng
Walking stick: cane. crutch.
Refers to the stick: rolling pin. Zen stick.
One of the ancient punishments was to beat with a stick: the spine of the rod.
Gu Tong "struggles", relying on it, relying on it.
Rod
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªzh√†ngÔºΩ
["Guangyun" cut in two straight, upper support, certificate. ]
(1) Walking stick; crutches.
(2) Refers to the stick; stunned.
(3) Generally refers to sticks or sticks.
(4) Refers to the mourning baton held at the time of mourning.
(5) It is said that holding a mourning stick at a mourning.
(6) Weapons.
(7) The name of the ancient criminal law. Strike the prisoner's back, buttocks, or legs with a large wattle or bamboo board.
(8) Instruments of torture. The club used for the torture of the rod.
(9) Flogging.
(10) Grip, hold.
(11) Rely on, rely on.
